show.title: The Natural Lifestylist Podcast
show.summary: Tony Riddle devised his Natural Life-stylist philosophy as a way to recharge, reboot and re-educate on the importance of re-aligning ourselves with Nature for emotional, spiritual and physical health. Tony’s work is based around the premise that if we can recognise where nature is missing from our lives, we can reconnect with it and fall back in love with it, and in doing so can shake the angst-inducing monkey off our collective back.

title: Episode 5: Richie Norton
subtitle: Episode 5: Richie Norton
summary:
Meet Richie Norton AKA The Strength Temple.


I first met Richie at a dinner that WeMove Magazine had put together. We instantly hit it off. To be fair there’s not a lot to not like about Richie, so hitting it off is a no brainer. Richie is an ex-rugby player turned Yogi, surfer, adrenaline junkie. He has spent the last 10 years working alongside sports professionals and some of the most respected pioneers of human performance and what has grown out of this is Richie’s own unique blend of Meditation, Breathwork and Yoga to help us live more sustainability. .

If you liked the conversation then please show some love, by spreading the message wide and far. If you have in anyway been inspired by my barefoot sustainability running challenge then please make a donation to one or more of the sustainability and environmental organisations that I am fundraising for;
